270576.「たすけて～！\n 誰か いるの？\n おねがい！ ここから 出して～！:
Heeeelp! Is anyone out there? Please!!
Let me out of heeeeere!!

270577.何者かが ツボの中から 助けを求めている。\n手を貸して あげますか？<yesn:
Someone is inside the pot and it looks like
they need help. Lend a hand?<yesno><close>

270578.「くらいよぉ！ こわいよぉ！\n おねがい ここから 出して～！:
It's so scary in here! I'm so scared!!
Please, get me out of heeeere!

270579.<pc>は ツボの中に 手をつっこんだ。\n何か やわらかいものが 入っている…:
<pc> stuck their hand inside the
pot. You feel something soft...

270580.<pc>は やわらかい何かを\n思いきり ひっぱり上げた！:
<pc> pulled whatever was in the
pot out as hard as they could!

270581.「ぷるぷる……。このまま ずーっと\n くらくて こわいままかと思ったよぅ。:
(slurp)... I thought I was goona be stuck in
that scary place for a long slime...

270582.「助けてくれて ありがとう！\n ぼく スラピー！:
Thank goo for saving my life!
My name is Slurpy!

270584.「まあ。お優しいだけでなく\n なんと 強そうな お方でしょう！\n さぞ 名の:
Well, now...not only are you kind, but you
look very strong, too! I can clearly see that
you're quite the famous champion.

270585.「わたくしは リナーシェと申します。\n 天星郷に招かれた者の ひとりですわ。\:
My name is Linashe, and I am one of those
who were invited to the Firmament. You were
chosen too, yes?

270586.「……当代の 勇者の盟友 <pc>さま。\n その高潔なお心と 堂々たる たたず:
<pc>, ally to the Hero of this
time... Now I can truly understand your noble
heart and dignified look.

270587.「あなたほどのお方を 前にしては\n わたくしのごとき つまらない女が英雄など…:
For an ordinary woman like me to be called a
champion in front of someone like you...
I don't think it's right.

270588.「わたくしは 戦うことが 不得手なのです。\n これから始まる 紺碧の試練を\n:
I'm no good at fighting, so I don't know if
I can even make it through this trial...

270590.「ここで あなたと出会えたのも 天の導き。\n どうか わたくしと共に\n 試練:
I'm truly blessed to have met you here. Will
you join me in undertaking this trial?<yesno><close>

270591.「お願いいたします 盟友さま。\n わたくしには あなたの助けが 必要なのです。:
Please, great ally of the Hero! I really
need your help. So that's why...

270592.「ああ……ありがとうございます！\n さすがは 当代の 盟友さまですわ。\n な:
Oh, thank you so much! You really are the
ally of this time! I feel so reassured!

270593.「スラピーも いっしょに 行っていい？\n スラピー 仲間と はぐれちゃったの。: Can I come goo? I lost all of my gooriends!

270594.「もちろんです。\n スラピーちゃんのお友達を 捜しながら\n 行きましょうね。:
Of course you can. We'll go together to
help you find your friends.

270596.「この試練場をつかさどる 審判の天使さまは\n 裁定の清堂という場所に いらっし:
The Angel of Judgment in charge of this trial
is said to be located in a place called the
Hall of Arbitration. Let's go there first.

270600.「あのお方が 審判の天使さまでしょうか？: Is he the Angel of Judgment?

270601.「思いがけず 迷子のスラピーちゃんを\n お知り合いの所に 連れてきてあげられて:
I'm glad we were able to bring Slurpy to
someone that he knows.

270602.「そなたは 英雄 リナーシェ殿だな。\n 我が名は カンティス。\n この 紺碧:
You are the champion Linashe, correct?
My name is Kantis. I am the angel in charge
of the Azure Trial.

270603.「ところで リナーシェ殿。\n まさか……そやつと共に まいられたのか？:
By the way, Linashe...
You are not really planning on going together
with <if_woman>her<else>him<else>, are you...?

270604.「はい。盟友さまは\n わたくしとスラピーちゃんを 守りながら\n ここまで 連:
I am. The great ally here brought Slurpy and
I to this place while protecting us on the
way.

270605.「それは けっこうなことだ。リナーシェ殿の\n お役に立ったのなら たとえ その:
That's quite something. If such a person has
use to you, then there must be a reason they
were invited to the Firmament.

270606.「……カンティスさま。\n さっそくですが 試練を始めませんか？:
Mr. Kantis...I'd like to get started. May we
begin the trial?

270607.「盟友さまは 偉大なるチカラを 手にするのに\n ふさわしいお方。盟友さまと一緒:
The great ally here is worthy of the great
power. With them, I'm confident that I can
overcome any sort of trial.

270608.「……いいだろう。\n 紺碧の試練は きわめて 明快。\n 我が定めし 番人と戦:
Very well... The Azure Trial is simple. All
you must do is fight my chosen guardian and
defeat it in combat.

270609.「しかし ひと筋縄ではいかぬぞ。\n 汝らの相手は 天星郷でも 有数の実力者。\:
However, it is not as easy as it sounds. Your
opponent is one of the most powerful beings
in the Firmament. Steel yourselves.

270610.「さあ 行け！\n 紺碧の覇者 試練の守り人よ！:
Come now! Supreme of the Azure!
Guardian of this trial!

270612.「……汝らが ここへ至る 少し前のことだ。\n ひとりの英雄が 紺碧の試練に挑み:
Not long before you arrived here, another
champion underwent the Azure Trial and fought
against its guardian.

270613.「その英雄は おそろしく強く\n またたく間に 守り人を 追いつめていった。:
The champion was terrifyingly strong, and
defeated the guardian in no time flat.

270614.「そして トドメの 強烈な一撃によって\n 守り人は ８匹のスライムに分裂し\n:
And then, with just one mighty blow, split
the guardian into eight different Slimes who
were all flung away in different directions.

270615.「スラピーちゃんが そのうちの\n １匹ということなのですね。\n 残りの ７匹:
So Slurpy is one of the eight...?
What about the other seven...?

270616.「……合体した状態ならば いざ知らず\n 分裂したスライムたちは 弱い。\n 自:
...the Slimes in their split state are quite
weak on their own. It would be difficult for
them to come back here like that.

270617.「このままでは 試練が……なんということだ。\n せっかく 天使長から 審判の天:
As this rate, the trial will... What a mess. I
was just given the role of Angel of Judgment
personally by the Archangel!

270619.「汝らへは 試練の内容を 変えるとしよう。\n 二手に分かれ 失踪したスライムた:
I'm going to change the conditions of the
trial. Split into two groups and gather the
missing Slimes!

270620.「すべてのスライムが 見つかった時点で\n より多くのスライムを集めていた方を:
Whoever has collected the most Slimes after
they've all been found will be considered the
winner, and will pass the Azure Trial.

270621.「そして……敗者は 紺碧の試練に\n 失敗したものとする。偉大なるチカラを\n:
And...the loser shall fail the trial. Only one
of you shall be granted the great power.

270622.「……殿方は 本当に\n 争い事が お好きですわね。:
...You men really enjoy your contests and
disputes, don't you...

270623.「審判の天使さまが そう決められたのでしたら\n いたしかたありません。\n こ:
If it is the decision of the Angel of
Judgment, then so be it. For now, we'll go
our separate ways.

270624.「とはいえ……広い試練場を あてもなく\n 捜しまわるのは 骨が折れそうです。:
But now that I think about it...it would take
a lot of time to search the entire trial area
haphazardly...

270625.「それなら スラピーが ふたりに\n いいもの 貸してあげる！: I've got just the thing for goo!

270626.「まあ！ かわいらしいピアスですね。\n でも……どうして これを？:
My, what cute earrings these are!
But...what are they for?

270627.「あのねっ これを使うと とおい場所にいても\n スラピーと おはなしできるんだ:
Well, you can talk to me from anywhere with
these earrings!

270628.「スラピー 近くにいる仲間のこと\n ちょっとだけ わかるの。もし 仲間の場所が:
I can find out a little bit of information
about where my missing gooriends are. If I
find anything out, I'll tell goo!

270629.「ありがとうございます スラピーちゃん！\n これで あなたのお友達を\n 見つ:
Thank you, little Slurpy! We should be able
to find all of your missing friends now.

270630.「盟友さま。\n 片方ずつ お借りしましょう。: Let's both take one earring, shall we?

270632.「盟友さま。わたくしが あなたとの勝負に\n 勝つなんて 夢物語に近いのかもしれ:
Perhaps defeating you in a contest is a
distant dream for me. However...

270633.「わたくしなりに がんばらせていただきますね<heart>: I'll do the best I can in my own way. <heart>

270634.「くくく……。\n あやつに勝ち目など あるものか。:
Hmm hmm hmm...
They have no chance of winning.

270635.だいじなものの中にある\n『ぷるぷるスラピー』を使って\nスライムたちの居場所を:
Use the Wobbling Slurpy in your Key Items to
locate the other missing Slimes!

270636.「まあ 盟友さま。\n あなたも スライムさんを捜しに\n いらっしゃったのです:
Oh, if it isn't the great ally! I see you too
have come here looking for the Slime.

270637.「わたくしも この洞くつを調べようかと\n 思ったのですが……服が よごれてしま:
I was thinking of taking a look inside of
this cave, but...I was afraid that my dress
might get dirty if I did...

270638.「盟友さまは 進まれるのですか？\n ……でしたら どうか お気をつけて。:
Are you going in there? If you are...please
be careful.

270642.「ここは 我らのすみか。\n 生者が 足を踏み入れるなど……許せぬッ！:
This is my home...and I will not allow the
living to step foot in here...how dare you!!

270644.「ひゃあ～っ 助かった！\n あんたも 英雄さんかい？:
Wheeew, you saved me! Are goo a champion
too?

270645.「はい リナーシェと申します。\n スラピーちゃんの お友達ですね？\n あなた:
That's right. My name is Linashe. Are you one
of Slurpy's friends? I've come looking for
you.

270646.「オラは スラロウってんだ。\n 吹っ飛ばされた先で 魔物に追いかけられて\n:
My name's Goonther. After I got blown away,
I was chased by a monster but managed to
hide in this cave.

270647.「そこに おっかないオバケが いるんだもの！\n 動けなくて 困ってたんだわぁ。:
But there's a really scary monster right
there! I was stuck and thought I was done
for!

270648.「それは 大変でしたね。\n けれど もう 大丈夫ですよ。:
That must've been really scary. But everything
is okay now.

270649.「んだけど……あっちの英雄さんは\n 助けなくて いいのかい？:
Um, well...shouldn't we help that other
champion over there?

270650.「ええ よろこんで<heart>: Of course. I'd be happy to. <heart>

270652.……誰も いない。\nどうやら スライムは\nリナーシェに ついて行ったようだ。:
There's nobody here...
It seems that the Slime has gone along
with Linashe.

270653.「お着きになられていたのですね 盟友さま。: I see you've arrived, great ally.

270654.「スラピーちゃんが おっしゃっていた場所は\n ここで間違いないと 思うのですが:
I'm almost certain this is the place Slurpy
mentioned, but I don't see a single Slime...

270655.「また 戻ってこられるかもしれません。\n このあたりで 少し 待ってみましょう:
Perhaps they'll come back? Why don't we just
wait here for a little while?

270656.「それにしても 盟友さま。\n 試練場を歩きまわったり 魔物と戦ったり……\n:
You must indeed be quite exhausted from
walking all around the trial grounds and
fighting so many monsters...

270658.「怖がらなくて 大丈夫ですよ。\n さあ チカラを抜いて。\n わたくしに すべ:
You don't have to be afraid. Everything will
be fine. Just relax yourself, and I will take
care of the rest...

270659.「いい子ですね。\n さあ 目を閉じて……。:
That's a good <if_woman>girl<else>boy<endif>.
Now, just close your eyes...

270660.<cs_pchero>は リナーシェに言われたとおり\n目を閉じた。:
<cs_pchero> closed their eyes as Linashe
asked.

270664.ぷにぷにと やわらかい何かが\n<cs_pchero>に 押しつけられた……。:
Something soft and squishy was pressed
against <cs_pchero>...

270668.「う～ん。キミ すっごく いい匂い！\n ボク おなか すいちゃったよ。:
Mmmmm! You smell soooo good!
I'm getting hungry!

270670.「これは 魔物たちの 大好物の匂いを\n 再現した 魔物呼びの香水。\n うまく:
This is a monster-attracting perfume that
accurately recreates the smell of monsters'
favorite food. Looks like it worked well. <heart>

270673.「……申し訳ありません。\n 別の魔物まで 呼んでしまったようです。:
My apologies...I think I may have attracted
another monster.

270674.「ふわあ……ボク ひとりだったら\n アイツに 食べられちゃってたよ。\n やっ:
Whew...if I had been alone, I surely would
have been a gooner! Thank you for taking
care of it!

270675.「カンティスに言われて ボクを 捜しにきたの？\n じゃあ ボク キミに ついて:
Kantis sent you looking for me? Then let me
come with you! My name is Slurple. It's
nice to meet you!

270677.「さすがは 盟友さまですね。\n 戦うお姿も 勇壮で りりしくて……\n わたく:
As expected of the great ally! The way you
fought so bravely and heroically...
It really touched my heart. <heart>

270679.ぷるぷるスラピーが ぷるぷるしている。: The Wobbling Slurpy is wobbling around.

270680.もしもし！ ぼく スラピーです！\nふたりに おはなしが ありますっ。:
Hello! It's me, Slurpy! I have something I
need to tell goo!

270681.あのね……もう試練場に 仲間は いないみたい。\nもしかしたら フォーリオンまで:
Um...I'm not seeing any more of my gooriends
in the trial ground. Maybe they got blasted
away to Goorion!

270682.「そうですか……。\n ありがとうございます スラピーちゃん。:
I see...thank you for letting us know,
Slurpy.

270683.「迷子のスライムさんは 全部で ７匹。\n 盟友さまが見つけた スライムさんが:
There are seven missing Slimes in total. You
found two, and I found one.

270684.「残りのスライムさんは ４匹ですから\n 盟友さまが あと２匹 見つけると\n:
There are four left, so the contest will be
decided if you're able to find two more
Slimes.

270685.「困りましたわ。\n さすが 盟友さまは 強敵ですわね。:
Looks like I'm in trouble...I had no doubts
you would be a formidable adversary.

270686.「とにかく わたくしも\n フォーリオンへ 向かうことにします。\n それでは。:
Well, anyways, I'm going to make my way to
Fourion. I will see you soon.

270687.突然 <pc>の頭に 何かが直撃し\n<pc>は すっころんだ！:
Something suddenly hits <pc> on
their head, and they fall over!

270688.「おうおう ネエちゃん！\n オレっちの相棒に いったい なんの用でい！:
Hey! Hey, goo! What do goo want with my
pal here?!

270689.「おうおう ニイちゃん！\n オレっちの相棒に いったい なんの用でい！:
Hey! Hey, goo! What do goo want with my
pal here?!

270690.「あっ！ さては お前……英雄だな！？\n オイラたちを 連れ戻して\n また:
Oh! You're...a champion, right?! Aren't goo
the one who's bringing us back to the
trial?

270691.「そうは いくかってぇんでい！\n ドカンとやられて ピューっと吹っ飛んで……\:
I'm not goona let that happen! Bein' slurped
around and blown away like that... No way
I'm gooing through that again!

270693.「あのオネーサン……\n おれを 迎えにきてくれたんだけど\n 魔物どもに 襲わ:
That lady came to get me, but she was suddenly
attacked by those scary monsters!

270694.「なあ アンタ！ 強いんだろ！？\n オネーサンのこと 助けてやってくれよ！<y:
Hey, goo! You're strong, right?!
Please save that lady!<yesno><close>

270695.「頼むよ！ おれは 見てのとおり\n かわいいだけの かよわいスライム！\n オ:
Please! I'm just a cute little Slime, as goo
can see! Goo are the only one who can
save her!<yesno><close>

270697.「わたくしのことなど 放っておいて\n スライムさんを 先に 連れ帰っていれば\:
If you just had left me here and brought that
Slime back, you would have won,
wouldn't you?

270698.「あなたという方は…………。: You are the one who will...

270700.<center>星はまたたき 花はつぼむ\n波がゆりかご 瞳を閉じて\nお眠りな:
The stars do twinkle, flowers bloom so bright,
Waves are cradles, as your eyes close tonight,
My beloved child, rest well, and sleep tight.

270701.<center>剣はおろして 怒りは忘れ\n波がゆりかご 瞳を閉じて\nお眠りな:
Swords laid down, anger quelled, do not fight,
Waves are cradles, as your eyes close tonight,
My beloved child, rest well, and sleep tight.

270702.<center>夢はやすらぎ しとねは棺\n母なる海は すべてを いだく\nお眠:
Dreams bring solace, slumber's like a chest,
The motherly sea holds everything to rest,
Sleep now, and return home, my beloved child.

270703.「お帰りなさい。\n あなたの場所へ……。:
Welcome back. To the place where you
belong...

270704.「この歌のチカラこそ わたくしが英雄として\n 天星郷に招かれた ゆえんです。:
The power of this song is the reason I was
invited to come to the Firmament as a
champion.

270705.「盟友さま……。\n 試練のためとはいえ わたくしは\n あなたを 利用してばか:
Great ally... I have been taking advantage
of you for the sake of passing the trial.

270706.「そんな わたくしを あなたは助けた。\n わたくしを見捨てていれば あなたが勝:
But you saved me... If you had just left me
here, you would have won the contest and
passed the trial.

270707.「あなたのような方こそを\n 人は 英雄と呼ぶのでしょう。:
It is people like you who others call a
champion.

270708.「ですが……わたくしのような女にも\n ゆずれぬものが あるのです。:
However...even for a woman like me, there
are things that I cannot yield.

270709.「スラーレさん。\n わたくしと一緒に 来てくださる？: Goolliver. Will you come with me?

270711.「これで すべてのスライムさんを\n 見つけたことになりますね。\n 審判の天使:
All of the Slimes have been found, right?
Let's head back to the Angel of Judgment.

270713.「さっき やたらと凶暴な\n スライムたちに 体当たりされたんだ。:
Just now, a group of vicious looking Slimes
plowed right through me...

270714.「やつらを 捜してるのかい？\n そこの袋小路に 駆け込んでいったが……\n く:
You're looking for them? They ran towards
that dead end over there... I'd be careful
if I were you. Ouch, ouch...

270717.「もしかして……\n ブルースさんとブラザーさんの事でしょうか？:
Are you talking about...
Begooshi and Agooroyd over there?

270718.「ぷるぷる。\n オイラたち 凶暴なスライムじゃないよ。\n いい子のスライムだ:
(slurp) We're not bad Slimes!
We're good Slimes, honest! <heart>

270719.「姐さん 姐さん！\n それより はやく\n 残りの仲間を 捜しにいきやしょう。:
Hey, miss! Let's hurry so we can find the
rest of our gooriends!

270720.「オレっち……姐さんのためなら\n よろこんで 試練に戻りますぜ<heart>:
I'm...willing to go back to the trial if
it's for goo, miss... <heart>

270721.「……魔物呼びの香水は 使っていませんよ。\n あれは 先ほど 使い切ってしまい:
...I didn't use that attraction perfume this
time. I used that all up awhile ago.

270722.「ふふ……。戦うことだけが\n 強さではないと いうことです。:
Hehe...fighting is not the only way to
become stronger.

270723.「これで 盟友さまと わたくしの\n スライムさんは ３対３の 同数になりました:
This makes you and I tied three for three
with the Slimes we've found.

270724.「７匹目の……最後のスライムさんは\n どちらに いらっしゃるのでしょうね？:
I wonder where the seventh and last Slime
could be...?

270725.「見つかっていないのは スラーレの野郎ですね。\n 近くに気配は 感じやせんし\:
The only one of us that hasn't been found yet
is that Goolliver guy. I haven't seen him
around here, so I don't think he's in Goorion.

270726.「ですが 紺碧の試練場には いないようだと\n スラピーちゃんが おっしゃってい:
Slurpy told me that he wasn't in the trial
grounds, either...

270727.「ねえねえ リっちゃん。\n 試練場にある ザドムの泉は 捜した？:
Hey, hey! Miss Lin! Did goo search around
the Zadom Fountain in the trial goo-rounds?

270728.「あそこは 裁定の清堂から 遠いんだ。\n もし ザドムの泉に 仲間がいても\n:
That's pretty far from the Hall of
Arbitration. Slurpy wouldn't be able to notice
any gooriends that far away.

270729.「なるほど。では スラーレさんを捜しに\n ザドムの泉へ 向かうことにしましょう:
I see! Let's go to the Zadom Fountain and
search for Goolliver, shall we? Thank you
both for your help.

270730.「決着の時は 近いようですね。\n それでは 盟友さま お先に失礼します。:
It looks like the final part of the trial is
upon us. I will take my leave and go on
ahead.

270731.「おかえり～。\n 仲間たちを 見つけてくれて ありがとう！\n それじゃ ぷる:
Welcome baaack! Thank goo for finding all of
my gooriends! If you would, please take off
the earrings for me!

270732.<cs_pchero>と リナーシェは\nぷるぷるスラピーを スラピーに返した！:
<cs_pchero> and Linashe returned the
Wobbling Slurpy back to Slurpy!

270733.「すべてのスライムを 見つけたということは\n 勝敗が 決したのだな。:
If you've found all of the Slimes, then that
means the contest has been decided.

270735.「当然の結果だ。貴様のような者が\n 偉大なるチカラを 手にする\n 英雄に ふ:
It's a fitting conclusion. A person like you
does not deserve to be a champion to
inherit the great power.

270736.「いいえ。\n まだ 勝負は 終わっていませんわ。: No. The contest isn't over just yet.

270737.「スラピーちゃん。\n あなたを見つけ ここまで連れてきたのは\n どなたでした:
Slurpy. Who was it that found you and brought
you here?

270739.「カンティスさまは スラピーちゃんを\n 数に入れないとは おっしゃいませんでし:
Mr. Kantis never said that Slurpy didn't
count. So that makes it a tie four to four.

270740.「なっ…なぜ リナーシェ殿は\n そやつの肩を持つ！？:
W...why, Linashe? Why are you taking their
side?!

270741.「そもそも……あなたの 歌のチカラがあれば\n 天星郷じゅうから スライムを集め:
You do realize that with the power of your
song, you could've easily gathered the
Slimes from all over the Firmament?!

270742.「やはり 盟友さまを 失格にしようと\n わたくしに有利な勝負を させていたので:
Just as I thought...you were trying to
disqualify them by creating this contest
in my favor.

270743.「なぜ あなたが 盟友さまを嫌うのかは\n 存じません。しかし あなたがしたこと:
I do not know your reasons for disliking
them. But what you did goes against the
duty of an angel, does it not?

270744.「偉大なるチカラは 世界を守るチカラ。\n ４つの試練を乗り越えた者 全員に与え:
The great power is the power to protect the
world. It's given to those who are able to
surpass all four trials.

270745.「逆に言うと 試練の脱落者が 増えれば\n 世界を守るチカラを持つ者が 減るとい:
On the contrary, the more who fail the trials, the fewer there are who have the power to protect...and protecting the world is an
angel's duty...

270746.「盟友さまを 試練から脱落させようという\n あなたのたくらみは 天使のつとめと:
Is it not against your duty as an angel
to try and get them to fail the trial?

270748.「わたくしの考えが 正しいか否か……\n 天使長さまに 報告して\n ご判断いた:
Whether I'm right or I'm wrong...
I would like to see what the Archangel
thinks regarding this matter.

270749.「そういえば 審判の天使とは\n 天使長さまより 仰せつかった\n 名誉ある お:
That's right...the Angel of Judgment is quite
the prestigious position bestowed upon you by
the Archangel...is it not?

270750.「カンティスさまの不手際のため わたくしたちが\n スライムさんを 捜しにいく事:
Does the Archangel know that we had to go
looking for those Slimes all because of your
mistake, Kantis?

270752.「まあ ひどい。\n 魔性の女と お呼びになって<heart>:
Oh, my! How harsh.
To be called such a horrible woman... <heart>

270754.「俺は 勝負に勝ったほうを\n 試練の通過者と見なすと 言った。\n だが 勝負:
I said I would consider the winner of the
contest to be the one who would pass. But
the contest ended in a draw.

270755.「ならば 本来の試練を 受けてもらおう。\n 試練の守り人と戦い 勝利してみせよ:
Then allow me to put you through the true
trial. You must fight this trial's guardian
and win.

270756.「天星郷 指折りの実力者……\n 紺碧の覇者 ホーリーキングにな！:
The most powerful being in the Firmament...
Supreme of the Azure! Holy King Slime!

270757.「おふたりの おかげで\n 元の姿に 戻ることができたこと\n 感謝の念に たえ:
I cannot thank goo two enough for helping
me return to my former self.

270758.「ですが 手加減は いたしません。\n 試練の挑戦者に 全力で 応えること……。:
But I will not goo easy on you! Responding to
those who wish to challenge me in this
trial...that is my gooty as guardian!

270760.「さあ 盟友さま！\n 今度こそ ふたり一緒に\n 試練を 乗り越えましょう！:
Come on, great ally! Let's undertake the
trial together this time!

270761.「わたくしは 歌であなたを お助けします。\n 盟友さまは チカラいっぱい\n:
I will aid you with my songs. Please fight
with all of your might! <heart>

270766.「また 吹き飛ばされても かなわん。\n ……汝らの 勝ちだ。:
I don't want him to get blown away again.
...I acknowledge your victory.

270767.「少なくとも <cs_pchero>\n 貴様の強さだけは 認めねばならんな。:
I will at least give you some credit for your
strength, <cs_pchero>.

270768.「紺碧の試練は これで しまいだ。\n ……これを持って とっとと 先へ進むがよ:
That concludes the Azure Trial.
...take this, and be on your way.

270769.<cs_pchero>が持つ\n魂の燭台に 炎が灯った！:
One of the candles on <cs_pchero>'s
Soul Candelabra has been lit!

270770.「カンティスさまに お考えを\n あらためていただくことができて\n よかったで:
I was glad to hear that Kantis had
reconsidered his thoughts about you.

270771.「じつは わたくし これでも\n 過去には 一国を治めていた身ですので\n 交渉:
I used to rule a country in the past, so I'm
used to negotiating diplomatic affairs.

270772.「……まだ お話して おりませんでしたね。\n わたくしは６００年ほど前の ウェ:
...I still haven't told you about me. I lived
in the Wena Islands some 600 years ago, and
laid the foundation for Verinard.

270773.「わたくしの死してのち 世の人々は\n ヴェリナード王家の始祖である わたくしを:
As the founder of Verinard's royal family,
people all over the world called me "the
First Diva" after I had died.

270774.「ただし その名も 当時の歴史も ３００年前\n バサグランデという魔物が ウェ:
However...both that name and the history of that era are said to have been lost due to the turmoil of a horrible monster called Bogan
that ravaged the Wena Islands 300 years ago.

270775.「天星郷に招かれ 目覚めたとき\n 天使さまから そう うかがいました。:
When I awoke and was invited to the
Firmament, I was told all this by an angel.

270776.「唄うことしかできず 剣も持てない わたくしが\n すべての試練を成しとげ 偉大:
As someone who can only sing and not even
hold a sword, I'm not sure if I'll be able to
complete all of the trials.

270777.「けれど英雄として この時代 この場所に\n かりそめの命を 与えられたこと……:
However, as a champion...I am grateful that
I am granted another life during this era.

270778.「だって……あなたに 会えたから…………<heart>: And...I was also able to meet you... <heart>

270779.「すべての試練を 乗り越え また\n 相まみえることを 心から 願っておりますわ:
I sincerely hope that we can overcome all of
the trials and meet again soon. For now, I
bid you farewell.

276985.「紺碧の試練は これで しまいだ。\n ……とっとと 先へ進むがよい。:
That concludes the Azure Trials. You may
proceed onward.

278596.紺碧の試練に 合格した。\n四天の星巡りを すべて終えるために\n残りの試練に:
You have passed the Azure Trial.
Make your way to the remaining trials to
complete the Four Heavenly Trials.

278597.すべての試練に合格し 四天の星巡りを達成した！\n神都フォーリオンの聖天区画へ進:
You have passed all trials, completing the
Four Heavenly Trials! Return to Fourion and
meet with the Archangel!

278599.「あの方のことは 心配ありませんよ。\n かの勇者の盟友が 相手では\n 魔物の:
They will be fine, don't worry. I feel more
sorry for any monster that has to deal with
the ally of the Hero.

278600.「はあ～……さっすが 英雄さんは頼もしいなァ。\n そんじゃ リナーシェちゃん\:
Gosh...that champion is so cool and reliable!
Okay then, Linashe! Please take me with goo!

278601.「盟友さま。こちらの 魔物の相手を\n お願いしてもよろしいですか？ おわびに\:
Great ally...may I ask you to deal with this
monster? In exchange, I will give you the
Slime I found...

285078.「そこで……わたくしにも 何か\n できる事がないか 考えてみたのですが…………:
So I...was just wondering if there was
anything that I could do to help...
